name: Stellate
description:
Stellate is a visual novel game about the last human in the world, writing his/her feelings before the end of the world.

This game uses a linear narrative, the player can choose the order of exploring the poems.

It contains a lot of work on environment building and UI designing. Innovative use of circular buttons scattered around the screen as options.

The music name "夜にかける" means 'Running towards night', which is suitable for the motion and story in this game.

Original music author: https://youtu.be/x8VYWazR5mE

Piano version from:https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1fD4y1D7Gb

Character model: https://unity-chan.com/

Icons from:https://www.flaticon.com/
